General.Name: Petro Matad Limited
General.Description: Petro Matad Limited, together with its subsidiaries, explores for, develops, and produces oil in Mongolia. It holds 100% interests in production sharing contract blocks, including Ongi Block V that covers an area of approximately 7,937 square kilometers; and Matad Block XX that consists of an area of approximately 218 square kilometers in Mongolia. Petro Matad Limited was incorporated in 2007 and is based in Douglas, Isle of Man.
General.Address: Victory House, Douglas, Isle of Man, IM1 1EQ
